name: Make it Fresh
description: Find, save and manage new recipes. Simply input ingredients lying around and get smart suggestions. MERN stack application utilizing Edamam API and recipe database.

name: Movie Genre Classifier
description: Neural network to predict what genres a movie is based on its title. Trained from trimmed IMDB database, using Keras and TensorFlow. Try it out!

name: This Website!
description: Responsive, fast and minimal static PWA made with GatsbyJS and React. Uses modern styled components, Formspree powered forms, and hosted on Github Pages.

name: Advanced Protect
description: Car maintenance hub with interactive instructions and health status on tires, oil, etc. Personalized to make, model and annual mileage. Created in React, utilizing Google Maps and CarMD APIs.

name: New Legs
description: Streamlined IT Ticketing system for Level 1 IT Support agents. One page application with simple and easy to use interface. Created with Angular 5 and Java Spring backend
